name: Mystery Box VR: Hidden Secrets
summary:
AN IMMERSIVE VR PUZZLE EXPERIENCE
Interact with objects, handles, buttons, and wheels on each side. Crack enigmas and collect hidden puzzle tiles on a random side of the boxes.

You won't be able to compare reality with fiction.

DISCOVER INVENTIONS
Once you unlock all 8 boxes of a Level Pack, you can compose a puzzle and discover a brief history of an invention.

It's not always easy to escape the room, so use all your IQ to crack the riddles. There's a logic behind all of them, even where it seems...
